title: Setup Your Blog in Minutes
description: Blogging platform that empowers users to create, publish, and share their own blogs with a global audience.

title: Telegram Subscription & Access Control
description: A SaaS platform that monetizes Telegram groups with subscription-based access, automated bots. Supports PayPal payments with multi-group & memberships.

title: Zentry UI
description: Simple and intuitive user interview with animations using Framer Motion for a gaming website.

title: Crypto Vault
description: Create, manage, and secure your crypto wallets with a single mnemonic phrase. Built for both Solana and Ethereum blockchains.

title: Dynamic Notes
description: One Step solution for your To-Do List and Notes with Dynamic UI.

title: Admin Dashboard
description: Streamlined management tool that offers administrators easy access to analytics and content management.
